com.yworks.yfiles.view.input

Class StripeDropInputMode

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.yworks.yfiles.view.input.DropInputMode
      • com.yworks.yfiles.view.input.ItemDropInputMode<IStripe>
        • com.yworks.yfiles.view.input.StripeDropInputMode
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IInputMode

    public class StripeDropInputMode
extends ItemDropInputMode<IStripe>
    An ItemDropInputMode specialized to drag 'n' drop IStripes.

    A dragged IStripe is optionally visualized during the drag operation.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class com.yworks.yfiles.view.input.DropInputMode

      • createStripe

        protected IStripe createStripe(IInputModeContext context,
                               IStripe newParent)
        Create a new stripe as the result of a drag and drop gesture.

        This method is called by the ItemCreator that is set as default on this class.

        Parameters:
        newParent - The parent for which to create the stripe.
        context - The context for which the stripe should be created.
        Returns:
        a newly created stripe.

      • getPreviewTableLayout

        protected RectD getPreviewTableLayout(PointD location,
                                      SizeD size)
        Calculates the layout of the new table.

        In this implementation the mouse location is used as center of the table. Can be overridden in child class to implement a different layout.

        Parameters:
        location - Current mouse position
        size - Size of the table
        Returns:
        a RectD with the given size and the mouse location as center.

      • setDragLocation

        protected void setDragLocation(PointD location)
        Description copied from class: ItemDropInputMode
        Sets the drag location and calls ItemDropInputMode.updatePreview(IGraph, PointD) to update the layout of item preview based on the mouse coordinates and the results of the SnapContext.
        Overrides:
        setDragLocation in class ItemDropInputMode<IStripe>
        Parameters:
        location - The current location of the mouse in world coordinates.

        Description copied from class: ItemDropInputMode
